attributes.additional_details: EUGENE PRICE WAS SENTENCED  TO 25YEARS WITH NO EVIDENCE..JUST A BLACKBERRY MESSAGE ON SOMEBODY ELSES PHONE,HE WAS CHARGED WITH CONSPIRACY OF ARSON..CONSPIRICY TO SELL CLASS A DRUGS AND CONSPIRICY TO POSSESS FIREARMS, EUEGENE HAS NEVER BEEN FOUND WITH A GUN OR DRUGS IN HES POSSESION,THE POLICE SAY HE IS A GYPSY KINGPIN AND HE HAS THE READING AND WRITING CAPACITY OF A FOUR YEAR OLD
